chart_description: This chart provides quantiles of timings for various parts of the Cluster Autoscaler (CA) main loop which helps to efficiently manage the nodes in a Kubernetes cluster. It provides an insight into how long it takes for different parts of the main loop to execute.

dimension_descriptions.quantile_0.5: 50th percentile value of time taken by various parts of the CA main loop.
dimension_descriptions.quantile_0.9: 90th percentile value of time taken by various parts of the CA main loop.
dimension_descriptions.quantile_0.99: 99th percentile value of time taken by various parts of the CA main loop.
